coding_practice.title: Repeated Substring Pattern
coding_practice.description: Given a string s, check if it can be constructed by taking a substring of it and appending multiple copies of the substring together.

examples.explanation: It is the substring "abc" four times or the substring "abcabc" twice.

coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 10^4
s consists of lowercase English letters.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 遍歷可能的子串長度 i 從 1 到 n//2。
2. 如果 n 能被 i 整除，檢查 s[:i] 重複 n//i 次是否等於 s。
3. 若相等，返回 True，表示存在重複子串。
4. 否則遍歷完成後返回 False。
